name: courses-aalto-better-filters
author: Miska Tammenpää <miska@tammenpaa.com>
description: A browser extension to improve the UX of Aalto University course search.

scripts.build:copy: cp src/*.svg build && cp src/manifest.json build && cp src/filters.css build
scripts.build: bun run build:ts && bun run build:copy
scripts.package: (rm courses-aalto-better-filters.zip || true) && /usr/bin/zip -r courses-aalto-better-filters.zip build filters.css manifest.json LICENSE *.svg
